data.name: FirstNameIsEmpty

data.value: Last name cannot be longer than {0} characters

data.value: Email cannot be empty

data.value: Email cannot be longer than {0} characters

data.name: EmailIsInvalid
data.value: Enter a valid email

data.name: PasswordIsEmpty
data.value: Password is required

data.name: PasswordIsTooShort
data.value: Password has to be at least {0} characters long

data.name: PasswordWithoutUppercaseLetters
data.value: Password has to contain at least one uppercase letter

data.name: PasswordWithoutLowercaseLetters
data.value: Password has to contain at least on lowercase latter

data.name: PasswordWithoutNumericCharacters
data.value: Password has to contain at least on numeric character

data.name: PasswordWithoutSpecialCharacters
data.value: Password has to contain at least one special character

data.name: ConfirmPasswordDoesNotMatchPassword
data.value: Confirm password does not match password

data.name: ExternalAuthServiceNotSpecified
data.value: External authentication service type has to be specified

data.name: InvalidExternalAuthService
data.value: Invalid external authentication service

data.name: InvalidJwtClaims
data.value: Invalid JWT claims

data.name: AccessTokenIsEmpty
data.value: Access token is not provided

data.name: RefreshTokenValueIsEmpty
data.value: Refresh token value is not provided

data.name: RefreshTokenWasNotFound
data.value: Refresh token with specified value was not found

data.name: RefreshTokenWasNotFoundOrExpired
data.value: Refresh token was not found or expired

data.name: DeviceIdIsNotProvided
data.value: Device ID is not provided

data.name: UserDoesNotHaveExternalLogins
data.value: You do not have external logins

data.name: UserDoesNotHaveSpecificExternalLogin
data.value: You do not have external login from the specified external authentication service

data.name: InvalidData
data.value: Provide valid data for creating an account

data.name: AccountWasNotFoundByEmail
data.value: Account with the given email was not found

data.name: AccountWasNotFoundByExternalAuthServiceData
data.value: Account with the data received from external authentication service was not found

data.name: InvalidPassword
data.value: The given password is not valid
